job_description_formatted:
The world of digital assets is accelerating in speed, magnitude, and complexity, opening the door to new ways for leveraging the blockchain. Fireblocks’ platform and network provide the simplest and most secure way for companies to work with digital assets and it trusted by some of the largest financial institutions, banks, globally-recognized brands, and Web3 companies in the world, including BNY Mellon, BNP Paribas, ANZ Bank, Revolut, and thousands more.

We are looking for a dynamic and driven Professional Services Engineer to join our team.

In this role, you will work directly with our clients to design, implement, and deliver custom solutions that meet their unique requirements.

You will act as a technical expert and bridge the gap between client needs and our product capabilities.

What You'll Do

  • Collaborate with clients to understand their technical requirements and design tailored solutions.
  • Build and implement custom tools, integrations, and scripts to enhance client operations using Fireblocks’ platform.
  • Work on both frontend and backend components to deliver end-to-end solutions.
  • Assist clients in integrating with Fireblocks APIs and developing workflows for crypto and web3 operations.
  • Provide technical training and guidance to clients, ensuring smooth adoption of custom solutions.
  • Stay updated on the latest trends in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and decentralized technologies.

What You'll Bring

  • 2+ years of experience in software development.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python.
  • Strong understanding of frontend and backend technologies.
  • Hands-on experience working with SQL and NoSQL databases.
  • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Knowledge of blockchain and crypto development, including smart contracts, web3 libraries, and wallet integrations.
  • Understanding of security protocols and best practices in crypto and blockchain.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a client-centric mindset.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for working with diverse clients.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with Fireblocks or similar crypto platforms.
  • Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.

Fireblocks' mission is to enable every business to easily and securely access digital assets and cryptocurrencies. In order to do that, we strongly believe our workforce should be as diverse as our clients, and this is why we embrace diversity and inclusion in all its forms.

job_description_formatted:
About the job

Join our innovative R&D team at Visual Layer as a Quality Assurance Specialist!

We are seeking a talented individual to ensure our platform’s excellence. You will develop, execute, and refine testing strategies to guarantee product quality, reliability, and security. Your work will directly impact high-stakes deployments, including defense and government collaborations.

The ideal candidate is an exceptionally organized, methodical professional who has the experience necessary to take our products to the next level in accuracy, security, and safety. The specialist will be charged with developing a complete QA program that not only safeguards product quality but also fosters a culture in which all employees are actively engaged.


Visual Layer is a dynamic startup dedicated to revolutionizing visual data management. We're building tools to help data scientists, data analysts, and developers efficiently manage, explore and curate large-scale image and video datasets.


What you'll do:

  • Plan, execute, and oversee product inspection and testing to ensure quality and conformance to specifications and deliverables.
  • Collaborate with Engineering, Product, and Marketing teams to resolve issues and optimize product performance.
  • Investigate product quality reports and ensure issues are resolved according to company guidelines and regulatory standards.
  • Continuously enhance testing tools and processes to improve efficiency and effectiveness. Create technical content such as blog posts, tutorials, open-source projects, and documentation to assist developers in adopting Visual Layer’s tools, especially fastdup.
  • Ensure consistency across the website and social media platforms.


Requirements:

  • 3+ years experience in QA for software or data platforms (Must).
  • Experience with tools like JIRA and TestRail (Must).
  • Saas and OnPrem experience (Must).
  • A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong understanding of testing frameworks and methodologies.
  • Knowledge of visual data systems is an advantage.
  • Experience with white box and black box testing.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Communication Skills.
  • Demonstrated commitment, a proactive mindset, eagerness to learn, and a strong drive to contribute and succeed.
  • Fluent in English.
  • Certifications in QA (optional).

job_summary: CHEQ is the global leader in Go-to-Market Security, trusted by over 15,000 customers worldwide to protect every aspect of their marketing, sales and data operation from bots, fake users, fraud and cyber attacks. Powered by award-winning cybersecurity technology, CHEQ offers the broadest suite of solutions for securing the entire funnel, from paid marketing to on-site conversion, data and analytics. CHEQ is a global company with offices in Tel-Aviv, New York, UK and Tokyo. We are seeking a Director of Product to join our team and lead our Fraud & Abuse Management products. As a Director of Product, you will play a vital role in defining and executing the product plan, ensuring that our products meet the needs of our customers and drive business growth. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and customer support, to develop and deliver innovative solutions that empower our clients to protect their website and APIs from fraud, abuse and bot attacks. Responsibilities : Product Strategy and Roadmap : Develop and communicate a clear and compelling product strategy for your products, aligned with the company's vision and market trends. Collaborate with key stakeholders to define the product roadmap and prioritize features based on customer needs, market opportunities, and business goals. Market and Customer Research : Conduct market research and gather customer insights to identify market trends, customer pain points, and opportunities for product enhancements. Use this information to drive product innovation and differentiation. Product Development and Execution : Work closely with the engineering and design teams to translate product requirements into actionable plans. Define user stories, prioritize feature development, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality solutions. Collaborate with engineering teams to address technical challenges and ensure product scalability, reliability, and security. Cross-functional Collaboration : Partner with marketing and sales teams to gather customer feedback, understand market demands, and ensure successful product launches. Provide product expertise and support to these teams, enabling them to effectively promote, sell, and support Ensighten.com products. Product Performance Analysis : Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate the success and impact of the products. Monitor user adoption, customer satisfaction, and revenue growth metrics. Analyze data and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and drive product optimization. Competitive Analysis : Stay informed about the competitive landscape and emerging industry trends related to online risk and fraud. Conduct competitive analysis to identify product gaps and opportunities for differentiation. Use this information to refine the product roadmap and drive competitive advantage. Customer Advocacy : Serve as a customer advocate throughout the product development process. Engage with customers, understand their pain points, and incorporate their feedback into product requirements and enhancements. Continuously seek opportunities to improve the customer experience and drive customer success with Ensighten.com products. Requirements : Proven Experience : At least 5 years of experience in product management in online risk management, onsite fraud prevention, or bot mitigation. Experience with enterprise software products and B2B markets is mandatory. Technical Knowledge : Solid understanding of APIs, javascript, and networking. Familiarity with relevant cybersecurity technologies and techniques. Customer Focus : Passion for understanding customer needs and delivering exceptional user experiences. Demonstrated ability to translate customer requirements into actionable product features. Strategic Thinking : Ability to think strategically and align product initiatives with business goals. Proven track record of developing and executing product strategies that drive revenue growth and market success. Strong Communication Skills : Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams, present ideas, and influence stakeholders at all levels. Analytical and Data-driven : Proficient in data analysis, using metrics and analytics tools to inform product decision-making. Ability to draw insights from data, identify trends, and make informed decisions. Project Management : Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities, meet deadlines, and drive results in a fast-paced environment. Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, engineering, business administration, or a related field is preferred. Show more Show less

CHEQ is a global company with offices in Tel-Aviv, New York, UK and Tokyo.


We are seeking a Director of Product to join our team and lead our Fraud & Abuse Management products.


As a Director of Product, you will play a vital role in defining and executing the product plan, ensuring that our products meet the needs of our customers and drive business growth.


You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and customer support, to develop and deliver innovative solutions that empower our clients to protect their website and APIs from fraud, abuse and bot attacks.


Responsibilities:


  • Product Strategy and Roadmap: Develop and communicate a clear and compelling product strategy for your products, aligned with the company's vision and market trends. Collaborate with key stakeholders to define the product roadmap and prioritize features based on customer needs, market opportunities, and business goals.
  • Market and Customer Research: Conduct market research and gather customer insights to identify market trends, customer pain points, and opportunities for product enhancements. Use this information to drive product innovation and differentiation.
  • Product Development and Execution: Work closely with the engineering and design teams to translate product requirements into actionable plans. Define user stories, prioritize feature development, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality solutions. Collaborate with engineering teams to address technical challenges and ensure product scalability, reliability, and security.
  • Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with marketing and sales teams to gather customer feedback, understand market demands, and ensure successful product launches. Provide product expertise and support to these teams, enabling them to effectively promote, sell, and support Ensighten.com products.
  • Product Performance Analysis: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate the success and impact of the products. Monitor user adoption, customer satisfaction, and revenue growth metrics. Analyze data and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and drive product optimization.
  • Competitive Analysis: Stay informed about the competitive landscape and emerging industry trends related to online risk and fraud. Conduct competitive analysis to identify product gaps and opportunities for differentiation. Use this information to refine the product roadmap and drive competitive advantage.
  • Customer Advocacy: Serve as a customer advocate throughout the product development process. Engage with customers, understand their pain points, and incorporate their feedback into product requirements and enhancements. Continuously seek opportunities to improve the customer experience and drive customer success with Ensighten.com products.


Requirements:


  • Proven Experience: At least 5 years of experience in product management in online risk management, onsite fraud prevention, or bot mitigation. Experience with enterprise software products and B2B markets is mandatory.
  • Technical Knowledge: Solid understanding of APIs, javascript, and networking. Familiarity with relevant cybersecurity technologies and techniques.
  • Customer Focus: Passion for understanding customer needs and delivering exceptional user experiences. Demonstrated ability to translate customer requirements into actionable product features.
  • Strategic Thinking: Ability to think strategically and align product initiatives with business goals. Proven track record of developing and executing product strategies that drive revenue growth and market success.
  • Strong Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams, present ideas, and influence stakeholders at all levels.
  • Analytical and Data-driven: Proficient in data analysis, using metrics and analytics tools to inform product decision-making. Ability to draw insights from data, identify trends, and make informed decisions.
  • Project Management: Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities, meet deadlines, and drive results in a fast-paced environment.
  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, engineering, business administration, or a related field is preferred.

job_description_formatted:
About Nanit:


Welcome to Nanit, the high-growth baby tech company that is changing the way parents view their babies' wellness through the world’s most advanced baby monitor and parenting products. In 2016, the Nanit baby monitor revolutionized the industry with computer vision and machine-learning capabilities that helped parents understand their baby’s sleep patterns and allowed them to achieve better sleep quality. Now, the company has become the leader in the connected parenting space, with an incredible customer base of highly-engaged parents who look to Nanit as a source of information and expertise on their parenting journey.


What you’ll be doing:

  • End-to-end Release Management: Own the release lifecycle from scheduling and planning to deployment, ensuring that mobile app updates, hotfixes, and new features are compliant with medical device regulations and delivered on time while meeting the highest quality and safety standards.
  • Cross-functional Coordination: Collaborate with Product, Engineering, and QA teams to ensure all release requirements are met, blockers are resolved, and issues are addressed promptly.
  • Release Planning: Create and maintain detailed release schedules and milestones, taking into consideration regulatory requirements, user impact, and risk assessment. Ensure that all stages of the release are documented in compliance with medical device standards.
  • Version Control & Documentation: Manage version control systems and maintain accurate release notes, tracking changes and updates across multiple versions.
  • Risk Management: Identify and mitigate risks in the release process, proactively addressing potential issues that could impact timelines, quality, or regulatory compliance.
  • Process Improvement: Continuously improve release processes by identifying bottlenecks and optimize efficiency.
  • Post-release Review & Feedback: Coordinate feedback loops and post-release analysis to capture lessons learned, share insights, and refine future release processes.


Who you are:

  • 2+ years of experience in project management or release management within a regulated industry, ideally with a focus on mobile applications and medical devices.
  • Strong project management skills: Excellent planning, organizational, and time management abilities, with a proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Exceptional communication skills: Comfortable providing frequent updates, managing stakeholder expectations, and working with cross-functional teams.
  • Problem-solving mindset: Ability to handle complex release challenges and resolve issues in a time-sensitive environment.
  • Technical Skills: Experience with mobile app development, deployment processes, and familiarity with version control systems. Knowledge of medical device software release requirements is a plus.
  • Experience in the medical device industry or with regulatory release processes is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience using project management tools like Jira and Confluence.
  • Fluency in English, both written and spoken.


Bonus Skills:

  • Understanding of automated testing and quality assurance practices.
  • Familiarity with additional medical device regulations, such as FDA, ISO 13485, IEC 62304 for software development in medical devices.

job_description_formatted:
bondIT Global is an independent provider of portfolio construction technology and credit analysis for fixed income. It brings together data science, AI, software, and fintech expertise to empower today’s portfolio manager and financial advisors. 

We have offices in Herzliya (Israel), Berlin, New York, and London.


We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our R&D group to build and develop our evolving data platform.


What You'll Do:

  • Data Pipeline Development: Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient data pipelines to support business needs.
  • ETL Processes: Implement and optimize complex ETL processes to ingest data from multiple sources, including vendor market data, client market data, and external/internal APIs.
  • Data Knowledge: Work closely with data scientists and product teams to understand data requirements and deliver impactful data solutions.
  • Data Quality Assurance: Ensure data accuracy and quality through validation, testing, and best practices.


What We're Looking For:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field.
  • Python Experience: 3+ years of experience in Python for data process development.
  • ETL Experience: 3+ years of experience in ETL development and querying data warehouses to support applications that are used by external clients.
  • DB Experience: 2+ years of experience working with databases, such as MySQL.
  • Technical Skills: Familiarity with Linux environments.
  • Collaboration: Strong team player with excellent communication skills.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Cloud Expertise: Experience with cloud environments, preferably AWS.
  • Analytical Databases: Familiarity with analytical databases like ClickHouse and/or Snowflake.
  • Pipeline Tools: Experience with pipeline tools such as River, Dagger, Airbyte, or Airflow.
  • Domain Knowledge: Understanding of fixed-income data is a plus.


What you will gain during your time with us:

  • Working for a leading Fintech startup with advanced technologies in a micro-services architecture
  • Diverse activities and autonomous implementation of own ideas in a dynamic environment
  • Hybrid working model and an attractive salary
  • Generous learning and development budget



At bondIT, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, physical and mental disability, or sexual orientation.

job_description_formatted:
Stratasys is a world leader in 3D printing!

Stratasys is leading the global shift to additive manufacturing with innovative 3D printing solutions for industries such as aerospace, automotive, consumer products and healthcare. Through smart and connected 3D printers, polymer materials, a software ecosystem, and parts on demand, Stratasys solutions deliver competitive advantages at every stage in the product value chain. The world’s leading organizations turn to Stratasys to transform product design, bring agility to manufacturing and supply chains, and improve patient care.


We are seeking an experienced Senior Cybersecurity Threat Hunter to join our Information Security team. This senior-level role is critical in leading proactive threat hunting, vulnerability mitigation, digital forensics, and incident response (DFIR) efforts to safeguard our organization’s infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have extensive expertise in identifying and mitigating advanced cyber threats, related to Identity, Data, Device & Application. conducting in-depth forensic analysis and driving risk-reduction initiatives across the organization. As a senior member of the team, you will mentor junior staff, set strategic directions for threat detection, and play a pivotal role in enhancing our security posture.


Key Responsibilities

  • Advanced Threat Hunting: Lead proactive threat hunting initiatives to detect sophisticated cyber threats, attack vectors, and vulnerabilities across all environments (on-premises, cloud, hybrid).
  • Optimize & Secure: Ensure security improvements of Microsoft 365 platforms. Conduct regular audits to monitor and optimize the security posture of MS 365 Defender platforms.
  • Risk Reduction Strategy: Analyze organizational risk from emerging threats, providing strategic recommendations and working cross-functionally to implement effective mitigation strategies that reduce exposure to cyberattacks.
  • Mentorship & Leadership: Train junior threat hunters and cybersecurity staff, helping to develop team capabilities and improving overall security intelligence.
  • Incident Investigation: participate in high-priority investigations, utilizing advanced analysis techniques to assess the scope and impact of incidents, determine threat actor tactics, and recommend actionable response measures.
  • Threat Intelligence Integration: Utilize advanced threat intelligence platforms and external sources to enhance threat detection and anticipate evolving attack techniques. Implement threat intelligence into detection strategies and mitigation plans.
  • Security Tools & Forensic Techniques: Drive the configuration, customization, and optimization of security tools, including SIEM, EDR solutions, and forensic platforms, to improve the team’s ability to detect and respond to threats.
  • Strategic Reporting & Documentation: Develop and present reports of threat trends, findings and improvements.
  • Cross-Department Collaboration: Work closely with IT, DevOps, Security and other business units to ensure proactive Cybersecurity threats mitigation and security posture improvements share knowledge on security risks and mitigations.
  • Process Improvement: Lead continuous improvement efforts in threat hunting methodologies, forensic analysis techniques. Stay updated on the latest cybersecurity trends and technologies to ensure cutting-edge threat detection and defense.


Qualifications & Skills

  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field or equivalent experience.
  • Experience:
  • At least 6 years of experience in IT Infrastructure, Systems & Network Administrator, and Proven experience as a Microsoft 365 Engineer/Architect and Global Tenant admin
  • 3 years of experience in Information Security/Cybersecurity domain in threat hunting, analysis & security engineering.
  • Advanced Technical Proficiency:
  • Deep understanding of Microsoft 365 security suite, including Defender, Entra ID, MS Purview, Azure Security, SSO, OneDrive, Teams, SharePoint, and Power Automate.
  • Comprehensive knowledge of Microsoft 365 technical architecture and interdependencies with other enterprise services.
  • Deep knowledge in networking, specifically OSI/TCP IP model and protocols.
  • Extensive knowledge of security technologies, including firewalls, endpoint protection, SIEM, and vulnerability management tools including logs and forensics analysis.
  • PowerShell Proficiency: Advanced skills in PowerShell scripting for automation and management and response actions.
  • Experience with cloud security (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and hybrid environments.
  • Windows/RHEL security knowledge- advantage
  • Familiar with CIS benchmarks/ hardening guidelines- Advantage
  • Can-do attitude, customer-facing, accountable, positive attitude, and time management skills.
  • Team player, confident, independent, and enthusiastic
  • Excellent communication skills & excellent English (speaking, reading, and writing)
  • Certifications (preferred):
  • MS 365 Security certifications or equivalent to:
  • Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
  • Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA)
  • Certified Cyber Threat Hunter (CCTH)
  • Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
  • Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP)
  • Certified Expert in Threat Intelligence (GCTI)

job_description_formatted:
Check Point Software Technologies is looking for a Network Administrator that will operate, maintain, and help to improve Check Point's growing network infrastructure.


Why Join Us?


You will be a part of the IT Infrastructure team responsible for the design, maintenance, and operation of a complex IT infrastructure.


Key Responsibilities


  • Responsible for technical operation and engineering of Check Point networks including hands-on implementation, monitoring and management of network infrastructure.
  • Ensure uninterrupted network uptime for users and customers access across LAN, WAN and Wireless Networks within corporate infrastructure.
  • Maintain high availability and continuous uptime for Data Center infrastructure and application services.
  • Documenting and managing the installation of a new network environment, maintaining, and upgrading existing systems as necessary.
  • Manage the day-to-day operations of the company’s network.
  • Problems troubleshooting and resolving.
  • Support the complicated LABs and improving the efficiency of network setups.
  • This is an opportunity to be part of the team that is building a dynamic high­-performance networks and implementing cutting edge technologies.
  • Must be able to share 24x7 support responsibilities for critical network segments.


Qualifications


  • 5 -7 years hands-on experience with large scale networks operation and architecture.
  • Proven experience with:
  • Cisco Nexus Line equipment.
  • Cisco Catalyst line network equipment.
  • Cisco ISR, ASR series routers.
  • Load balancing technologies (Citrix NetScaler - an advantage).
  • Wireless LAN technologies (Juniper Mist - an advantage).
  • Cisco ISE experience (an advantage).
  • Strong knowledge of complex networks (CCNP certification level).
  • Experience working with Linux based servers and systems.
  • Knowledge of virtualization infrastructure VMware/Nutanix.
  • Excellent communication skills, customer oriented, including the ability to produce usable and maintainable documentation.
  • Highly motivated team player.
  • Proficient in spoken and written English.
  • Self-Learning ability.
  • Strong troubleshooting and analytical skills.
